entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High 8. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 07:48 AM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries at times heavy or rain showers. High 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the morning then rain showers or flurries at times heavy beginning in the afternoon then changing to flurries at times heavy later in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 40 km/h gusting to 60 late in the morning. High 7. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 07:48 AM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
